contextDescription: Advanced Object-Oriented Programming in Python, focusing on class attributes, special methods, string representation, and operator overloading.
learningObjectives: Understand why Python programming is awesome
Learn what Object Oriented Programming is
Understand the difference between a class and an object
Differentiate attributes and their visibility (public, protected, private)
Work with class attributes vs instance attributes
Implement special methods for string representation (__str__, __repr__)
Track class instances with class attributes
Use static methods for functionality independent of instance state
Use class methods to create alternative constructors
Handle instance creation and destruction events
Solve the N-Queens problem using OOP principles
prerequisites: Functions and data types in Python
